name: Eclipse (CentauriGames)
description:
Legend has it that the first pregnancy of every millennium would be cursed.

The unfortunate mother would beget two twins whose souls were divided, broken.

One of them would be sowed with the seed of light, while the other would host the one of darkness. Just as there is no night without day, they could not live without each other...

Discover the story of Erebos and Hyperion, and join then in their search for Seramar's amulets throughout 10 levels that will prove your problem solving and skill abilities.

Team up with your best partner and venture into co-op mode, in search of a shared puzle-solving experience, or dare to face the infinite mode, the greatest challenge of Eclipse. Tackle the various levels continuously and overcome them before the timer expires.
